job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Nonprofit Organization Management,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: The Data Scientist works independently using a robust math toolbox to discover solutions for a diverse portfolio of interesting and challenging problems. The Data Scientist develops, implements, and monitors advanced analytic, medical informatics, and predictive modeling tools for health care programs. The scientist normally works Monday through Friday day-light business hours or as needed.
